37 #include <moveit/task_constructor/stages/fixed_cartesian_poses.h>
38 #include <moveit/task_constructor/storage.h>
39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/marker_tools.h>
40 #include <moveit/planning_scene/planning_scene.h>
41 #include <rviz_marker_tools/marker_creation.h>
42 
43 namespace moveit {
44 namespace task_constructor {
45 namespace stages {
46 
47 typedef std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> PosesList;
48 
49 FixedCartesianPoses::FixedCartesianPoses(const std::string& name) : MonitoringGenerator(name) {
50  auto& p = properties();
51  p.declare<PosesList>("poses", PosesList(), "target poses to spawn");
52 }
53 
54 void FixedCartesianPoses::addPose(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose) {
55  moveit::task_constructor::Property& poses = properties().property("poses");
56  if (!poses.defined())
57  poses.setValue(PosesList({ pose }));
58  else
59  boost::any_cast<PosesList&>(poses.value()).push_back(pose);
60 }
61 
62 void FixedCartesianPoses::reset() {
63  upstream_solutions_.clear();
64  MonitoringGenerator::reset();
65 }
66 
67 void FixedCartesianPoses::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
68  // It's safe to store a pointer to this solution, as the generating stage stores it
69  upstream_solutions_.push(&s);
70 }
71 
72 bool FixedCartesianPoses::canCompute() const {
73  return !upstream_solutions_.empty();
74 }
75 
76 void FixedCartesianPoses::compute() {
77  if (upstream_solutions_.empty())
78  return;
79 
80  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr scene = upstream_solutions_.pop()->end()->scene()->diff();
81  for (geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose : properties().get<PosesList>("poses")) {
82  if (pose.header.frame_id.empty())
83  pose.header.frame_id = scene->getPlanningFrame();
84  else if (!scene->knowsFrameTransform(pose.header.frame_id)) {
85  ROS_WARN_NAMED("FixedCartesianPoses", "Unknown frame: '%s'", pose.header.frame_id.c_str());
86  continue;
87  }
88 
89  InterfaceState state(scene);
90  state.properties().set("target_pose", pose);
91 
92  SubTrajectory trajectory;
93  trajectory.setCost(0.0);
94 
95  rviz_marker_tools::appendFrame(trajectory.markers(), pose, 0.1, "pose frame");
96 
97  spawn(std::move(state), std::move(trajectory));
98  }
99 }
100 } // namespace stages
101 } // namespace task_constructor
102 } // namespace moveit
